welcomeBannerSlides.title: Hello, I’m Dr Sloka. I’m here to help you
welcomeBannerSlides.description: Dr. Sloka, (a pen name for Dr. Sukesh Krishna Chaitanya Loka), professionally is a Clinical Pharmacologist, a freelance Clinical Psychologist and a Medical Trainer. In short, he is a Med and Mind Mentor! By Passion, he is a poet, an artist, a writer and an author too! If your struggle is in the mind, remember that your recovery is also within your mind. Dr. Sloka guides you through the recovery process!
